channel.title: git on emacs vi
channel.description: Recent content in git on emacs vi

item.title: git多账户切换
item.description: github多账号 ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "email@work_mail.com" -f "id_rsa_work_user1" # ~/.ssh/id_rsa # ~/.ssh/id_rsa_work_user1 ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa_work_user1 创建~/.ssh/config # Personal account, - the default config Host github.com HostName github.com User git IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa # Work account-1 Host github.com-work_user1 HostName github.com User git IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa_work_user1 参考 multiple-gihtub-accounts
